description: Default well-rounded meal suggestions. Admin can customize per student in Firestore.
Breakfast: Scrambled eggs, whole-wheat toast, orange juice
Bagel with cream cheese and apple
Egg and cheese sandwich on English muffin
Lunch: Turkey sandwich, lettuce, tomato, carrot sticks
Ham and cheese wrap, cucumber slices
Tuna salad on whole wheat, apple
Dinner: Baked salmon, roasted sweet potato, green beans
Chicken stir-fry with mixed vegetables over rice
Pasta with marinara sauce and side salad
Beef and vegetable stew, whole-grain bread
Bean and cheese burrito, rice, salsa
Pork tenderloin, mashed potatoes, steamed broccoli
